__TOC__

After performing a test, add your name or IRC nick and the test result (PASS/FAIL) to the appropriate cell in the table.  Any failures should be reported to `#ubuntu-devel` on FreeNode, where someone should be awake continuously from now until release. ;-)

The latest test images can be found at:

* http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/daily/
* http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/daily-live/
* http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/dvd/

=== Desktop tests ===

# Log in with default session
# Note login sound, if equipped with appropriate hardware
# Launch Firefox, Evolution, Yelp from panel icons, confirm successful startup
# Load `www.ubuntu.com` in Firefox
# Launch OpenOffice.org Writer via the Applications menu
# Type a brief document into Writer
# Launch Help from Writer
# System->About Ubuntu
# If you have, plug in an USB drive and check that they are mounted and you get nautilus windows
# Log out, shut down/reboot

=== Notes ===

* OEM install instructions can be found in BreezyReleaseNotes
